channel.title: Cant Run in BM
channel.description:
Hey, i have a problem when im playing black mesa. When im pressing SHIFT (to run) my character not sprinting, is walking little more slowly. When i am pressing the ALT button (for walking slowly) nothing happens. i tried to change the bindings key for those commands, but everything stays the same (exept from the key i changed)
Can u help me?
and sorry for my spelling mistakes.

item.title: Cant Run in BM
item.dc:creator: IlayGun
item.description:
you were right, i forgot to chack the game settings…
THX

Read full topic

item.title: Cant Run in BM
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
It sounds like you have ‘always run’ on. Uncheck that if you want to toggle sprinting.

Read full topic
